price: Yã ku Manzanni! Ku ci daga abũbuwa mãsu dãɗi* kuma ku aikata aikin ƙwarai. Lalle Nĩga abin da kuke aikatãwa, Masani ne.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلرُّسُلُ كُلُواْ مِنَ ٱلطَّيِّبَٰتِ وَٱعۡمَلُواْ صَٰلِحًاۖ إِنِّي بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ عَلِيمٞ
footnotes: * Allah Ya umurci ManzanninSa da cin halat sa'an nan su aikata aikin ƙwarai. Haka kuma Ya umurci Mũminai. Sabõda haka karɓar aiki na ƙwarai an tsayar da shi ne a kan cin halat.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-rusulu kulū mina al-ṭayibāti wa-iʿ'malū ṣāliḥan innī bimā taʿmalūna ʿalīmun
